title: Elixir card
data:
{{Version031}} {{flavour|The card depicts a smug smile formed out of nine chalices. Drawing this card rapidly restores the user's health and magic.}} The Elixir card increases the player's HP and MP rapidly for a few turns. The duration of the effect is 3 * power_level + 1d3 turns.
